casebody.data:
No. 10-577. Akio Kawashima, et ux., Petitioners v. Eric H. Holder, Jr., Attorney General. 563 U.S. 1007, 131 S. Ct. 2900,

179 L. Ed. 2d 1245,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 3840. May 23, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted limited to Question 1 presented by the petition.

Same case below, 615 F.3d 1043.
